metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16469 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
The merge.recursive function in the merge package <1.2.1 can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of the Object prototype. These properties will be present on all objects allowing for a denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-merge - 2.1.1+ds-3
node-merge - 2.1.1+ds-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-merge package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1+ds-3').
